rules_text:
Inscribe [i]( Your enchantments can help cast this spell. Each enchantment you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1} or one mana of that enchantment's colors.)[/i]
When Explorer's Tale enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance or a 3/3 green and white Beast token with trample, then draw a card.
special_text:
Inscribe
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
II – Create a 3/3 green and white Beast token with trample.
III – Draw a card.
